Reviews.Title: Great Laptop
Reviews.Author: Roxana "roxanadog"
Reviews.Content: This computer was given to me as a gift for Christmas, it is just a great laptop, I haven't had any problems with it. It's light weight and is great for carrying, I take it everywhere!! The screen is a nice size not too small or too large it's perfect.  Very fast, wireless capacity, and it's easy to use. So if your looking for a great portable computer this is the one you need.

Reviews.Title: This is Great
Reviews.Author: Pat LaCotts
Reviews.Content: I gave this notebook to my granddaughter.  She loves it.  Her only problem is the keys are a tad small.  We will be getting another one (larger  when her daughter wants one of her own.

Reviews.Title: Too few ports
Reviews.Author: Ronald E. Goodman "Ron"
Reviews.Content: Computer is a good value for the money but with only 3 USB ports, 2 of them so close together there is a serious size limit on what they can be used for, it is a drawback.

ProductInfo.Features:
2.30GHz AMD V-Series Processor for Notebook PCs V140, 2GB DDR3 System Memory (2 DIMM)
250GB (5400RPM) Hard Drive, SuperMulti 8X DVD±R/RW with Double Layer Support
ATI Mobility Radeon HD 4250 Graphics , 15.6" diagonal High-Definition HP BrightView Display (1366 x 768)
802.11b/g/n WLAN, integrated microphone
Genuine Windows 7 Home Premium 64-bit
ProductInfo.Name: HP 15.6" Pavilion G56-126NR Notebook PC
